amendatorysection.catchline: Support and paternity matters; protection orders; referral or assignment.
amendatorysection.para: A district court, separate juvenile court, or county court may by rule or order refer or assign any and all matters regarding the establishment, modification, enforcement, and collection of child, spousal, or medical support, paternity matters, and orders issued under subsection (1) of section 42-924 to a child support referee for findings and recommendations.
